mapper.select: SELECT count(business_no) FROM mtrace.account_mgmt WHERE business_no = #{businessNo} AND license_no = #{licenseNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_mgmt (business_no, account_nm, account_type, license_no, ceo_nm, address, addr_cd, post_cd, addr_detail, addr_type, telephone, mobile, fax, remark, reg_date) VALUES (#{businessNo}, #{accountNm}, #{accountType}, #{licenseNo}, #{ceoNm}, #{address}, #{addrCd}, #{postCd}, #{addrDetail}, #{addrType}, #{telephone}, #{mobile}, #{fax}, #{remark}, current_timestamp() )
